title: Will this laptop run LoL smoothly?

embed.description: With TOSHIBA has delivered the goods once again. Buy online or instore today at JB Hi-Fi

body:
Toshiba Satellite L50-B05C 15.6" Notebook
Will this notebook? run smoothly on League?
If it's bad for LoL, recommend me another laptop that is under $800.
It has AMD Radeon R7 M260 Graphics.
Thank you

replies.body:
Well, it would run League. My biggest concern is how it states 1.7GHz that can be clocked to 2.7GHz. That could cause severe overheating issues with a laptop, the end result being applications suddenly running at extremely low frame-rates.

If you are able to overcome these issues, then you'll definitely be able to run League at 30fps on it's lowest settings no sweat.
